name: Buggin' Out!
description:
In Buggin' Out you play as an alien space bug who needs to get back home. 
You've been locked up in the maximum security sector of a science lab, so you'll need to use mind control to free yourself and escape the lab!

Use high stealth tactics to navigate around and don't get caught!

WASD/Right click to move, Left click to take over a host, E to interact.
